title: AI craze is distorting VC market, as tech giants like Microsoft and Amazon pour in billions of dollars
content: With the biggest companies in the world throwing billions of dollars at generative AI startups, traditional VCs are struggling to find their place in the boom.
summary: With the biggest companies in the world throwing billions of dollars at generative AI startups, traditional VCs are struggling to find their place in the boom.

title: Dell and Palantir to join S&P 500; shares of both jump
content: In the quarterly rebalancing of the S&P 500, tech companies Dell and Palantir were added to the benchmark index.

title: Trump is no threat to U.S. democracy, according to historian Niall Ferguson
content: "The system contained Trump's impulses in 2020, 2021, successfully, and I think it would contain them again," Ferguson said.
summary: "The system contained Trump's impulses in 2020, 2021, successfully, and I think it would contain them again," Ferguson said.

title: August payrolls grew by a less-than-expected 142,000, but unemployment rate ticked down to 4.2%
content: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to expand by 161,000 in August while the unemployment rate fell to 4.2%.
summary: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to expand by 161,000 in August while the unemployment rate fell to 4.2%.

title: Honor looks to get ahead of Apple in China with its own AI assistant

title: Eighty-eight corporate leaders endorse Harris in new letter, including CEOs of Yelp, Box

title: 'Economic refugees' flee from New Zealand as cost-of-living crisis deepens

title: Director of Disney's Lion King says AI is a 'Wild West,' echoes how animation changed film

title: China should focus on fighting deflationary pressure, former central bank governor says
